PatientDetails.Name: Jeffrey Cochran
MedicalHistory: Abscess of lower lobe of right lung with pneumonia
HospitalCourse: Admitted on 09/16/2024 for shortness of breath.
Underwent right thoracotomy, decortication, and right lower lobectomy on 09/17/2024.
Progressed to improve post-surgery but experienced ongoing complications related to sepsis and empyema.

Medications: Norco 7.5 mg as needed for pain

Sepsis.ClinicalNotes: Patient diagnosed with sepsis secondary to lung abscess and empyema. Underwent surgical intervention and responded well to treatment.

BloodProducts.TransfusionEvents: No blood transfusions administered during this encounter.
